Support HSA compute kernels with the HSA runtime.
Support the HSAIL compiler. Used to build intermediate form for different hardware.
Support the LC compiler. The LC (Lightning Compiler) is used by Comgr for runtime kernel compililation of ASM or HIP RTC.
